item.title: Vedanta: The ancient wisdom
item.description: What is Vedanta? In this article we’ll go over the Vedantic philosophy at a very high-level. This amazing and ancient philosohy is thousands of years old and is viewed as the most complete understanding of life and nature. I’ll discuss this topic from a personal perspective. I’m not a vedic scholar nor am I a monk. I’m just an regular person who has found these ideas to be valuable to bring peace, clarity and happiness in my life.
